Posts.Content: I just printed off the article from the ACS page talking about the MRI for Breast Cancer and High-Risk Women. It is about time! My breast cancer was not detected by a mammogram and had this been suggest, it would have helped me out alot! My doctor was aware that I was considered "high risk" too but never suggested it. Isn't it amaxing how we have to go through these things before we learning the hard way!
Posts.Title: MRI info for high risk
